actions.text: Committee on Budget. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Sasser under the authority of the order of Aug 2, 90. With written report No. 101-438. Minority views filed.

actions.committee: Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, for a period not to exceed 30 days
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, for a period not to exceed 30 days.
Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs discharged. Pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 889.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act to create a functional category for gross interest on public debt.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to create major functional categories for: (1) gross interest on the public debt; and (2) undistributed offsetting receipts, including interest receipts of trust funds.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act to create a functional category for gross interest on public debt.
